channel.title: [Source][Delphi] SendKeysHuman

item.title: [Source][Delphi] SendKeysHuman
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

procedure SendKeysHuman(Text: String);
var
  a: integer;
begin
  for a := 1 To Length(Text) do
  begin
    SendKeys(PChar(MidStr(Text, a, 1)), True);
    Wait(100 + Random(150));
    Application.ProcessMessages;
  end;
end;

You need to add to uses:
"sndkey32" for the sendkeys pluginfile
"MMSystem" for the wait function
"StrUtils" fot the MidStr function

You need the following function:
Wait: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1381.0.html
SendKeys: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1383.0.html

Read full topic
